body_html:
Note that the ordering of parameters was inconsistent between Variable and Tensor. Tensor had:

std(torch.FloatTensor source, int dim, bool unbiased, bool keepdim)

Variable had:

std(torch.FloatTensor source, int dim, bool keepdim, bool unbiased)

This changes Variable to match the Tensor order
body_text:
Note that the ordering of parameters was inconsistent between Variable and Tensor. Tensor had:
std(torch.FloatTensor source, int dim, bool unbiased, bool keepdim)

Variable had:
std(torch.FloatTensor source, int dim, bool keepdim, bool unbiased)

This changes Variable to match the Tensor order
body:
Note that the ordering of parameters was inconsistent between Variable and Tensor. Tensor had:

```
std(torch.FloatTensor source, int dim, bool unbiased, bool keepdim)
```

Variable had:

```
std(torch.FloatTensor source, int dim, bool keepdim, bool unbiased)
```

This changes Variable to match the Tensor order
